T02D1489:173b-4: h'um phat ces bya ba dang /
T02D1489:173b-5: aom h'um a'a: a'a: phat ces bya ba dang /
T02D1489:173b-6: aom h'um a'a: phat ces bya ba'i sngags bzhi brjod
T02D1489:173b-7: pas shar dang byang la sogs pa'i sgo'i slob dpon
T02D1489:173b-8: rnams dang lhan cig bskor ba gsum byas nas lhag
T02D1489:173b-9: pa dang chad pa'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i
T02D1489:173b-10: phyir 'khor lo la bltas te me tog bcom ldan
T02D1489:173b-11: 'das la phul nas shar dang byang la sogs pa'i
T02D1489:173b-12: rim pas nub la sogs pa'i phyogs su gnas te
T02D1489:173b-13: / aom badzra audgha ta ya sa ma ya bra
T02D1489:173b-14: be sha ya h'um zhes brjod cing sgo phye nas
T02D1489:173b-15: aom sa ma yam pra bi sh'a mi zhes brjod
T02D1489:173b-16: nas slar yang gar byas te me tog gi phreng
T02D1489:173b-17: ba blangs la mgo bor ba cing zhing phyogs dang
T02D1489:173b-18: phyogs bral du dri dang bdug spos la sogs pa'i
T02D1489:173b-19: mchod pa chen po rdzogs par byas nas 'khor lo
T02D1489:173b-21: sems can thams cad la dngos grub thams cad kyi
T02D1489:173b-22: bka' drin na mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba gdab
T02D1489:173b-23: cing bzlas pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1489:173b-25: / de nas rdo rje slob dpon sngar bar dkyil
T02D1489:173b-26: 'khor gyi khang bar zhugs nas bsrung ba'i don du
T02D1489:173b-27: las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i mthar gtor ma
T02D1489:173b-28: phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa nas 'thon te
T02D1489:173b-29: slob ma rnams bos la rmi lam dris nas mi
T02D1489:173b-30: dge ba rmis par gyur na de rnams thams cad
T02D1489:173b-31: pa'i sngags kyis yang dag par bsrungs la /
T02D1489:173b-32: de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro ba'i /
T02D1489:173b-33: aom bra ba sha bha ga w'an ma h'a su
T02D1489:173b-34: kha pra dam pa ra su khatto ma siddhya rtha
T02D1489:173b-35: dza: h'um bra siddhya su zhes gus pa dang bcas
T02D1489:173b-36: shing spro ba zhugs nas dkyil 'khor gyi khang par
T02D1489:173b-37: ji ltar 'byor pas yang dag par mchod pa byas
T02D1489:173b-38: nas lha'i 'khor lo mngon du gyur par bltas te
T02D1489:173b-39: / dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bla mar mos pa
T02D1489:173b-40: byas nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i slob ma gzhug pa'i
T02D1489:173b-41: cho ga'i rim gyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas sbyin
T02D1489:173b-42: par bya bzhin pa'i dbang bskur ba rjes su gnang
T02D1489:173b-43: ba'i mthar thug pa thob nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1489:173b-44: lo dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'dod
T02D1489:174a-0: chags chen po las byung ba'i @174a * //
T02D1489:174a-1: de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
T02D1489:174a-2: can gzugs brnyan lta bu zung du 'jug pa rdo
T02D1489:174a-3: rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1489:174a-4: ye shes su rig par byas nas slob ma gzhug
T02D1489:174a-5: pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub gsol bar bya
T02D1489:174a-7: nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D1489:174a-8: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D1489:174a-9: dpal ldan sngom par bdag deng bsgrubs //
T02D1489:174a-10: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po gdod ma'i lha //
T02D1489:174a-11: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D1489:174a-12: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag sgrubs shig / nyes pa med ba rtags pa ste //
T02D1489:174a-13: 'dod chags kun gyis rjes su chags //
T02D1489:174a-15: bcom ldan de nyid kyis bdag sgrubs //
T02D1489:174a-16: shin tu dga' ba chos kyi mchog / gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1489:174a-17: kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag / byang chub
T02D1489:174a-18: sems dpa' bdag sgrubs shig / dngos grub chen po
T02D1489:174a-19: kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i
T02D1489:174a-20: mchog / grub pa'i rdo rje che ba'i mchog /
T02D1489:174a-21: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag sgrubs shig / sems can
T02D1489:174a-23: sems can kun gyis nying la gnas //
T02D1489:174a-24: sems can kun gyi yab kyang yin //
T02D1489:174a-25: dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog / ye shes dam pa'i bden gang gis //
T02D1489:174a-26: dkyil 'khor thabs dang shes rab bdag / bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis //
T02D1489:174a-27: bdag gi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02D1489:174a-28: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1489:174a-29: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02D1489:174a-30: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1489:174a-31: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02D1489:174a-32: de bzhin nyid las nges par byung //
T02D1489:174a-33: bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1489:174a-34: gzugs brnyan gsal ba slob ma rnams //
T02D1489:174a-35: kun gyis sgrib med mthong bar shog / ces brjod do zhes bya ba ni slob dpon 'jug pa'o /
T02D1489:174a-37: // / de nas yol ba'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i
T02D1489:174a-38: slob ma rnams khrus dang dri bzang bo la sogs
T02D1489:174a-39: pas dag byed byas shing sbyin la g-yas kyi las
T02D1489:174a-40: thams cad pa'i chus mngon par gtor nas rnam par
T02D1489:174a-41: snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs te snying ga dang
T02D1489:174a-42: mgrin pa dang spyi bo rnam su rdo rje dang
T02D1489:174a-43: padma dang 'khor lo rnams la gnas pa nyi ma
T02D1489:174b-0: @174b dang zla ba la gnas pa'i h'um nag po
T02D1489:174b-1: dang / a'a: dmar po dang aom dkar po bsgoms
T02D1489:174b-2: nas las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i gos dmar
T02D1489:174b-3: dang / po bskon zhing / aom sarba ta th'a
T02D1489:174b-4: ga t'a nu ra bo dhya langk'a ra bsta p'u
T02D1489:174b-5: dza me gha sa mu dra sphar na sa ma
T02D1489:174b-6: ya h'um zhes pas smad g-yogs byas te /
T02D1489:174b-7: de bzhin du aom badzra raksha ham zhes pas bla
T02D1489:174b-8: gos byas la aom badzro shn'i sha h'um phat ces
T02D1489:174b-10: aom tsakshu rbandha ba ra ma na ya h'um zhes
T02D1489:174b-11: pas mig ras dmar po bcings te a'a: kham b'i
T02D1489:174b-12: ra h'um zhes pas me tog gi phreng ba gzung
T02D1489:174b-13: zhing h'um zhes brjod de las kyi rdo rje can
T02D1489:174b-14: gyis shar sgor gzhag pa de la gzhug pa'i phyir
T02D1489:174b-15: kye dga' ba la dga' ba khyod su yin zhes
T02D1489:174b-17: bde chen bdag ni skal ba bzad po lags //
T02D1489:174b-19: aom sarba yo ga tsitta su da y'a mi zhes
T02D1489:174b-20: brjod cing byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa
T02D1489:174b-21: de'i snying gar me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje
T02D1489:174b-22: bzung nas aom su ra te sam ya stham ho:
T02D1489:174b-23: siddha badzra ya th'a su kham zhes byin gyis brlabs
T02D1489:174b-24: la / deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyi /
T02D1489:174b-25: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1489:174b-26: gsang chen dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dum zhugs pa la
T02D1489:174b-28: ma dad pa rnams la yang ma yin no zhes brjod nas /
T02D1489:174b-29: aom khanda ro he h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1489:174b-30: zhes brjod cing khrid la a'a: kham b'i ra h'um
T02D1489:174b-31: zhes brjod pas yol ba'i nang du bcug nas ma
T02D1489:174b-32: h'a ra ta su dri dha su to shya su
T02D1489:174b-33: su kho badzra satva aa dya siddhyi mam zhes brjod
T02D1489:174b-34: cing bskor ba byas thal mo sbyar te dkyil 'khor
T02D1489:174b-35: gyi shar sgor 'dug nas aom sarba b'i ra d'a
T02D1489:174b-36: ki n'i p'u dzo pasth'a na y'atma n'am nirya ta
T02D1489:174b-37: y'a mi sarba b'i ra d'a ki n'i pra dznyo
T02D1489:174b-38: p'a y'atma nam samba r'a dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya
T02D1489:174b-39: bas dbus su'o // aom sarba b'i ra d'a ki
T02D1489:174b-40: n'i p'u dzo basth'a n'a y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta
T02D1489:174b-41: y'a mi sarba b'i ra b'i ri ni d'a ki
T02D1489:174b-42: n+y'a dhi tishtha m'am zhes bya bas shar la'o //
T02D1489:174b-43: aom sarba b'i ra d'a ki n'i p'u dza karma
T02D1489:174b-44: ne a'atma nam ni ry'a ta y'a mi sarba b'i
T02D1489:174b-45: ra d'a ki n'i l'a m'a badzra karma ku ru
T02D1489:174b-47: aom sarba b'i ra d'a ki n'i d'a ki n'i
T02D1489:174b-48: p'u dz'a pra bartta n'a y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta
T02D1489:174b-49: y'a mi sarba p'i ra d'a ki n'i khanda ro
T02D1489:174b-50: hsha badzra dharma pra bartta ya m'am zhes pas nub
T02D1489:174b-51: tu'o // aom sarba b'i ra d'a ki n'i p'u
T02D1489:174b-52: dz'a bhi shi k'a y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a
T02D1489:174b-53: mi sarba b'i ra d'a ki n'i r'u pi n'i
T02D1489:175a-1: shanytsi m'am zhes pas lhor ro //
T02D1489:175a-2: aom gu ru tsa ra no basth'a n'a y'atma n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D1489:175a-3: aom sarba satva pa ri tr'a n'a rtha y'atma n'am
T02D1489:175a-4: ni rya ta y'a mi zhes bla ma la phyag
T02D1489:175a-5: byas na / 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02D1489:175a-6: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis //
T02D1489:175a-7: des na ngas rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya
T02D1489:175a-8: ste ye shes gang gis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D1489:175a-9: pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams kyang 'thob par
T02D1489:175a-10: 'gyur na / dngos grub gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D1489:175a-11: khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D1489:175a-12: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur te re zhes brjod
T02D1489:175a-13: nas spyi bor rdo rje gzung zhing dril bu dkrol
T02D1489:175a-14: bas / khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje 'di //
T02D1489:175a-15: gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig la //
T02D1489:175a-17: zhes bsgrags la snying gar me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bzung nas /
T02D1489:175a-18: aom de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang ;
T02D1489:175a-19: / khyod kyi snying la yang dag bzhugs //
T02D1489:175a-20: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1489:175a-21: de ma thag tu dral de gshegs //
T02D1489:175a-22: zhes bka' bsgos nas las kyi bum pa'i steng gi
T02D1489:175a-23: padma'i snod na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga yi ge
T02D1489:175a-24: gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1489:175a-25: aom badzr'a mri to da ka tha: zhes la na bdun bzlas te /
T02D1489:175a-26: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1489:175a-27: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1489:175a-28: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02D1489:175a-29: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung zhig / ces brjod la /
T02D1489:175a-30: de nas dam tshig brtan pa'i slob ma la 'di smra bar bya ste /
T02D1489:175a-31: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi he ru ka nga yin gyis /
T02D1489:175a-32: ngas 'di gyis shig ces smras pa de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D1489:175a-33: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par yang mi bya ste /
T02D1489:175a-34: khyod yang ba ma sbangs par dus kyi bya ba
T02D1489:175a-35: byas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ta re zhes brjod
T02D1489:175a-36: do // dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02D1489:175a-37: skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi de ma thag
T02D1489:175a-38: tu slob ma a'a: yig las skyes pa'i 'od dpag
T02D1489:175a-39: med kyi gzugs can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1489:175a-40: cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1489:175a-41: bdag la dbab tu gsol zhes brjod nas de'i snying
T02D1489:175a-42: gar lam las byung ba'i rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes
T02D1489:175a-43: mtshan zhing grub bzhi pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor ser bo
T02D1489:175b-0: la gnas pa'i nyi ma la h'um yig sngon @175b
T02D1489:175b-1: po spyi bor bam las byung ba'i bum pa dkar
T02D1489:175b-2: zhing zlum pas mtshan pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor la zla
T02D1489:175b-3: bar ha yig dkar po mgrin par yam las byung
T02D1489:175b-4: ba'i g-yo ba'i ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa'i rlung
T02D1489:175b-5: gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu zla bar
T02D1489:175b-7: rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis thugs
T02D1489:175b-8: dang sku dang gsung rdo rje ro gcig pa bsgoms
T02D1489:175b-9: nas rkang pa dag gi 'og tu rlung gi dkyil
T02D1489:175b-10: 'khor gyis sbar ba'i ra yig yongs su gyur pa
T02D1489:175b-11: las ras mtshan pa'i nyi ma gru gsum pa'i 'od
T02D1489:175b-12: zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i dzhee: yig
T02D1489:175b-13: dmar pos h'um la sogs pa'i 'od kyis lus bkang
T02D1489:175b-14: nas dzhee: yig gi 'od kyi shugs kyis slob ma
T02D1489:175b-15: 'degs bzhin pa la gu gul gyi du bas bdug
T02D1489:175b-16: cing dril bu dkrol bas gar byed cing a'a be
T02D1489:175b-17: sha ya sto bha ya ra ra ra ra ts'a
T02D1489:175b-18: la ya h'um ha: a'a: dzhee: zhes pa'i sngags rnam
T02D1489:175b-19: pa brgyar brjod cing bsam gtan la gzhol bas 'bebs
T02D1489:175b-20: par byed do // phebs pa'i slob ma 'dod chags
T02D1489:175b-21: rdo rje'i gzugs can du rnam par bsams nas de'i
T02D1489:175b-22: lce la a'a: yig dmar po gsung rdo rje dang
T02D1489:175b-23: ro gcig pa zla ba gnas pa'i 'od zer dang
T02D1489:175b-24: bcas par bsgoms nas br'u hi badzra zhes brjod par
T02D1489:175b-25: par byed do // bya'o // de lta na 'di
T02D1489:175b-26: dge ba dang mi dge ba bden par smra bar
T02D1489:175b-27: par byed do // bya'o // 'gyur ro // de
T02D1489:175b-28: nas aom tishtha badzra zhes brtan par byas nas de
T02D1489:175b-29: rnams la ci snad zhes dris nas de rnams kyis
T02D1489:175b-30: smras pa'i dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po
T02D1489:175b-31: dang nag por snang na zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D1489:175b-32: dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi dngos grub kyi skal
T02D1489:175b-33: ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin no zhes brjod
T02D1489:175b-34: par byed do // bya'o // 'gyur ro // do
T02D1489:175b-35: // de nas zhugs pa'i lha snying ga'i sa bon
T02D1489:175b-36: gyi 'od kyis bkug nas rang gi snying ga'i sa
T02D1489:175b-37: bon la thim par bsgoms te slob ma'i mgo bor
T02D1489:175b-39: aom khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngon
T02D1489:175b-40: du 'gro ba'i h'um ha: a'a: dzhee: mu: zhes gshegs
T02D1489:175b-42: de nas slob ma'i mthe bong gnyis nas rdo rje
T02D1489:175b-43: dang bcas pa'i lag pas bzung ste rdo rje'i rkang
T02D1489:175b-44: stabs kyi tshul gyis gar byas nas las thams cad
T02D1489:175b-45: pa brjod cing bskor ba gsum byed du bcug nas
T02D1489:175b-46: bden pa'i byin rlabs zhes bya ba brjod de /
T02D1489:175b-48: bdag gis slob ma gzhug pa 'di //
T02D1489:176a-2: bsod nams dam pa'ang de ltar shog /'di yi dngos grub ci 'drar 'gyur //
T02D1489:176a-3: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur //
T02D1489:176a-4: bsod nams mthu yang ci 'dra ba //
T02D1489:176a-5: de 'drar dkyil 'khor du gyur cig / ces bya ba'o //
T02D1489:176a-6: de nas sngar gzung ba'i me tog gi phreng ba
T02D1489:176a-7: tr'am yig gis byin gyis brlabs par bsams nas mdun
T02D1489:176a-8: na gnas pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1489:176a-9: dbang phyug la dmigs nas de'i dbu la sngar gzung
T02D1489:176a-10: ba'i tr'am yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i me tog
T02D1489:176a-11: h'um yig gis dor bar bya ste /
T02D1489:176a-12: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes brjod do //
T02D1489:176a-13: de nas me tog lhung ba na dman pa dang
T02D1489:176a-14: 'bring dang mchog gi dngos grub rnams mtshon par bya'o
T02D1489:176a-15: // de la gal te sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod
T02D1489:176a-16: spu'am gtsug tor ram dbu la phor na phyag rgya
T02D1489:176a-18: spyan nam zhal la phog na sngags kyi dngos grub bo /
T02D1489:176a-19: lus kyi mchog la ni mchog go //
T02D1489:176a-20: lus kyi bar la ni 'bring ngo //
T02D1489:176a-21: 'og gi cha la ni dman pa'o //
T02D1489:176a-22: sku las ha cang ring ba la yun ring bos so //
T02D1489:176a-23: nye ba la ni dngos grub myur ro //
T02D1489:176a-24: lha rnams kyi rang gi gnas ni re mig la
T02D1489:176a-25: sogs pa rnam par bcad pa las shes par bya'o
T02D1489:176a-26: // gal te lha gnyis kyi bar du lhung na
T02D1489:176a-27: de'i tshe me tog de gang la nye ba de'i
T02D1489:176a-29: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na dngos grub phra mo'o //
T02D1489:176a-30: re kh'a rnams la lhung na de'i tshe slar yang dor ro zhes pa ni me tog dor ba'o //
T02D1489:176a-31: de'i rjes su phreng ba de rnams slob ma'i spyi
T02D1489:176a-32: bor bcing zhing pra ti grihna tvam ai mam satva
T02D1489:176a-34: / de nas slob ma'i snying ga'i zla ba la bdag po dang dpral bar ra dang /
T02D1489:176a-35: mig gnyis la slar yang aom mig gnyis 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1489:176a-36: aom de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02D1489:176a-37: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed bar brtson //
T02D1489:176a-38: rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa //
T02D1489:176a-39: phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1489:176a-40: zhes brjod cing gdong g-yogs bsal bar bya'o //
